column2: Add 350 unknown words to the Afrikaans-Dutch language pair. A list of previously unknown words can be provided. Please indicate your level in both these languages when claiming this task.

Apertium aims to be a closed system. This means that every lemma in the dictionary should be translatable in all inflexions. Currently, about 100 Afrikaans words don't have translations. Add these and ensure that the system is closed afterwards.
Currently, the pending tests for Afrikaans-Dutch are incomplete. Complete them and move the passing tests to a page for Regression tests."
